author: AZ
description:
====== IMPORTANT ======
THE COMPANION APP FOR iOS IS CURRENTLY PENDING APPROVAL, AND IS EXPECTED TO RELEASE AROUND MAY 14TH.

THE COMPANION APP IS REQUIRED FOR POSTING MESSAGES.
====== IMPORTANT ======

The PebbleSOS Companion App will allow you to inform your friends on Facebook when you're in danger!

1. Log in to your Facebook Account through the main page of this app, and grant access to publish actions and statues

2. When facing with dangerous situations, whether it's kidnapping or robbery, just shake your Pebble Watch really hard. A five-seconds countdown will start on your watch 
	1) You may cancel the countdown by clicking any button on your watch
	2) If you don't cancel the countdown, a status will automatically be posted to your Facebook, calling for "Help!" with your current location attached, this will be visible to all your friends.

i.e. if your current location is London, England, the status will be 
   "Help needed!! My location: 51.509979, -0.133700 #PleaseHelp #PebbleSOS" with longititude and latitude indicating your exact location.

   Once your friends see that status, your help should be on the way!

IMPORTANT:
Please do not abuse this application, the intention of this app is to save a friend or yourself when in serious danger or emergency situations.
title: PebbleSOS
